metadata.title: CVE-2024-42159 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: mpi3mr: Sanitise num_physInformation is stored in mr_sas_port->phy_mask, values larger then size ofthis field shouldn't be allowed.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
